title: Not a Legitimate President 1/16/17
description:
-Congressman John Lewis: "Trump is not a legitimate President" -Trump always tweets from the hip-Caller : "I voted for Trump to fix things not tweet things" -How dare Trump criticize a black congressman-Scared of being called a 'racist' -"It's Congressman Lewis"-Fun with media headline bias -'Trump starts MLK weekend by attacking freedom rider'-'Cancelling trips to black museums'-'Civil Rights Activist Attacked by Donald Trump' -Picking the right fights to fight-Buy your favorite 'Snowflake' a trophy @ DNCTrophy.com-John Lewis still lives in 1965-Only a 11 out of a 170?-Obama releases 10 prisoners-Omen accepts ...Gitmo 8 years later? -Why is Obama in such a hurry? -Intentionally doing dangerous things? -Protesting with human blood-Irony: The Nobel Peace Prize President is still at war 8 years later -----The 'art' of piss off President Trump

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
